title: 左叶子之和 (Sum of Left Leaves)
content: 思路: // @Title: 左叶子之和 (Sum of Left Leaves) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-15 16:56:33 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 40.2 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode() {} * TreeNode(int val) { this.val = val; } * TreeNode(int val, TreeNode left, TreeNode right) { * this.val = val; * this.left = left; * this.right = right; * } * } */ class Solution { public int sumOfLeftLeaves(TreeNode root) { return leftSum(root); } private int leftSum(TreeNode root){ if(root==null){ return 0; } int sum=0; if(root.left!=null&&root.left.left==null&&root.left.right==null){ sum+=root.left.val; } return sum+leftSum(root.left)+leftSum(root.right); } }
